data: Though I parted from you resolved to obey your impossible commands, yet know, oh charming _Sylvia_! that after a thousand conflicts between love and honour, I found the god (too mighty for the idol) reign absolute monarch in my soul, and soon banished that tyrant thence.
Love-Letters Between a Nobleman and His Sister
browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: romance|category: novels|category: british literature
